quote: Given the choice between the experience of pain and nothing, I would choose pain. – William Faulkner
fact: One of the reasons marijuana is illegal today is because cotton growers in the 1930s lobbied against hemp farmers they saw it as competition.

joke: I saw an ad in a shop window, "Television for sale, $1, volume stuck on full", I thought, "I can't turn that down".
